fc2fcb6c8262f5a2071f0f009437ed40b491331c.request_summary: sys:You are roleplaying as an NPC ... | msg:The player character says to c... | tools:11

response.content: Sure thing, traveler. Grom’s a quiet one, but he respects honesty and a good story. Start by offering a drink or a small token of goodwill, then ask about his hometown—he’ll warm up to you if you show genuine curiosity. Just remember, no force or threat; he’ll reveal more when he feels safe.
